Darkfate/Chamaleon::

"Yesss " hissed Darkfate, "Chamaleon can give it"

Chamaleon appeared in Base's door. He was a strange bot, with 10 
feet, tall and thin. His metallic skin was gray and some parts of his 
shell he had scales that changed their color. Chamaleon was brigt, 
big, red eyes and a large tongue.

Chameleon just waited that his leader arrived where he was.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Scyther::
> 
> Killfest shruggs. "Good enough for me," he says, looking around 
> again. He then looks at Darkfate. "Do you have a transwarp shuttle 
> available for use?"
> 
> Scyther, who had been walking behind quietly, looks up at the 
> question, waiting for Darkfate's answer. To him, the answer was the 
> difference between a quick jump from this planet to his old time 
and 
> a long slow trip through space.
> 
>
